fullDescription.intro:
This node applies a projection to the principal components on the given input data. The data model of the PCA computation node can be applied to arbitrary data to reduce it to a given number of dimensions.
The percentages in the selection of dimensions to reduce to give the expected approximation rates based on the training data fed into the corresponding learner node. These rates assume that data fed into the predictor is distributed equal to the data the PCA was computed for.

option.name: fail if missing values are encountered

fullDescription.option: If checked, execution fails if the selected columns contain missing values.
Determine the number of dimensions the input data is projected to. The percentage values give the estimated approximation rate based on the data the PCA was computed for.
If checked, the columns containing the input data are removed in the output table.
